author: RTÉ News
title: TikTok appeal continues to grow amidst Covid-19 crisis
description: The social video platform, TikTok, which was already a favourite of teens is increasingly being used by adults looking for ways to pass the time during coronavirus lockdowns.
content:
The social video platform, TikTok, which was already a favourite of teens is increasingly being used by adults looking for ways to pass the time during coronavirus lockdowns.
Users post short videos, no longer than 60 seconds but often as short as 15, to sho… [+4017 chars]
